page.title: 16HOME LIFE
page.content: {ZOE AGED 9 cont. Sometimes I go for another bike ride before lunch.I have my lunch over my Grandad's as well.When my cousin is here we often go for a walk down to the river Mimram or we go to the Bury with Ferny,my cousin's dog.With my cousin sometimes I go down a pathway that has got lots of trees in and we feed some goats that are there. When we get back home we sometimes play outside or sometimes we watch television.I also have my tea at my Grandad's then I go home have my hair washed then I watch television for a while then I go to bed.
